scripts.reference: rm -r public && mkdir public && cd public && ln -s ../../../static/global/icons global_icons && ln -s ../../../static/wuthering-waves/icons icons && ln -s ../../../static/wuthering-waves/map-tiles map-tiles && cd ..
scripts.dereference: cp -rL public public_temp && rm -r public && mv public_temp public
scripts.build: bun run reference && bun run dereference && next build
